item.title: Box2D Common Module
item.description: Math InvSqrt /// This is a approximate yet fast inverse square-root. inline float32 b2InvSqrt(float32 x) { union { float32 x; int32 i; } convert; convert.x = x; float32 xhalf = 0.5f * x; convert.i = 0x5f3759df - (convert.i >> 1); x = convert.x; x = x * (1.5f - xhalf * x * x); return x; } quake3 이후로 계속 많이 쓰인다는 Fast
